title: cmd/8g: internal compiler error: gins LEAQ nil *A
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main
type A struct{ a int }
func main() {
	println(((*A)(nil)).a)
}

2. What is the full compiler output?
./a.go:4: internal compiler error: gins LEAQ nil *A

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
8g version devel +9544314de8e8
